attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why does some families stay on benefits, smoke, drink tea / coffee when some of us have to go to work??? I dont mean the young families who are struggling but the folk who are brought up with their parents who has never worked and they think it is normal life to stay at home. They get the benfit and then either buy Fags or go to the pub to socialise while we work hard.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
